articles.title: Korea and Germany take recurve team golds - World Archery
articles.description: Olympic quota spots were also awarded
articles.content:
Japan took the third quota spot with their 6-2 bronze medal win over Italy after being knocked out in a semi-final shootout by Turkiye.
